resources.string: We would like to request permission to transform the photo into an anime style image. Could you please grant us the rights to do so?
AnimeMagic 💖 : Convert your photo to Anime https://animemagic.page.link/fun or
💖 Love the app? 🌟 Leave us a rating on the Play Store! 🙏 Your support means a lot to us. 🙌 Thanks for using our app!
After upload your photo click on `Convert` button , Your photo must be clear and contain a human face, illegal photos are not accepted
Try Later or use another photo
you have reached the limit for the number of conversion you can create at this time , Upgrade to Premium
Convert Your favorite photo to Anime using AI, Your photo must be clear and contain a human face, illegal photos are not accepted
